diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Complexity Science.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    ComplexityScience[Complexity Science] --> Field1[Mathematics]
    ComplexityScience --> Field2[Systems]
    ComplexityScience --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    mathematics --> mathematicsSub1[Theory]
    mathematics --> mathematicsSub2[Practice]
    systems --> systemsSub1[Theory]
    systems --> systemsSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
